Several-stage selection proportionate sample of industrial workers (excluding mining, construction and domestic industry). Proportioning by sector and qualitification groups (Variable VAR1). Overrepresented by education groups.
Questionnaire administered by interviewers, expert investigation with the immediate superior of the respondent.
A
